title: IDEs we had 30 years ago and lost (2023)
author: AlexeyBrin
aiHeadline: Remember when coding meant staring at a green screen? Yeah, those days are back with IDEs from the '90s that somehow feel both nostalgic and terrifyingly outdated.

title: Ripgrep 15.0
author: robin_reala
aiHeadline: After a decade of being the best, Ripgrep finally gets an update that doesn't break everythingâ€”miraculously, it's still faster than your average developer's coffee-fueled workflow.

title: ./watch
author: shrx
aiHeadline: Because watching your code change isn't creepy at all, here's a tool that lets you monitor every file like you're the NSA of your own projects.

title: Root System Drawings
author: bookofjoe
aiHeadline: Because who doesn't want to spend their weekend staring at underground plant structures? Here's a collection of root system drawings that will make you question your life choices.

title: Tinnitus Neuromodulator
author: gjvc
aiHeadline: Because nothing says 'modern tech' like a device that makes your ears ring even more, here's the latest in neuromodulation for your tinnitus needs.
